title: The Damaging Impact of Strategic Incompetence
itunes:title: The Damaging Impact of Strategic Incompetence
description:
Strategic incompetence has long been weaponized to hold women back in their work and family lives, while our media glorifies men who get away with it. We go over definitions and give examples of strategic incompetence in action. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
